video.title: Pretty Little Liars
video.synopsis: Rudderless without their missing leader, four formerly tight high school friends band together when a blackmailer threatens to spill their dirt.

episodes.synopsis: Four 16-year-old girls believe their secrets are safe forever after their friend mysteriously vanishes. But the truth may be only one text away.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: With the return of Jenna Marshall to Rosewood, the girls must face an unpleasant past as questions arise about Alison's death.
episodes.title: The Jenna Thing

episodes.synopsis: Old and new relationships are examined as the girls try to pay tribute to Alison's memory.
episodes.title: To Kill a Mocking Girl

episodes.synopsis: The girls take matters into their own hands and try to put a stop to "A," but their problems are far from over.
episodes.title: Can You Hear Me Now?

episodes.synopsis: Trying to ignore "A" backfired for the girls, and now they must pay the price. Meanwhile, they're also dealing with boy drama.
episodes.title: Reality Bites Me

episodes.synopsis: The homecoming dance is supposed to be a time for fun, but for four pretty little liars, disturbing secrets threaten to ruin their perfect night.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: After the homecoming dance, the girls try to sort out the devastation. Plus, "A" isn't the only one sending Aria texts.
episodes.title: The Homecoming Hangover

episodes.synopsis: Last-minute preparations for Alison's memorial get derailed when her brother arrives back in Rosewood.
episodes.title: Please, Do Talk About Me When I'm Gone

episodes.synopsis: The girls are trapped at school as a bad storm brews, and tensions run high. Plus, Byron leans on Ashley for advice on parenting.
episodes.title: The Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: The girls go "glamping" as threats from "A" escalate and the FBI arrives in Rosewood -- but the evening takes a dangerous turn.
episodes.title: Keep Your Friends Close

episodes.synopsis: Moments after Hanna is hit by a car, the girls' world is turned upside down. Meanwhile, the mysterious messages from "A" continue.
episodes.title: Moments Later

episodes.synopsis: As the girls try their best to support Hanna as she returns from the hospital, everyone has her own "surprises" to deal with.
episodes.title: Salt Meets Wound

episodes.synopsis: Aria and Ezra feel as if there may be no way out, Emily deals with opposition to her love life, and "A" has Hanna jumping through old hoops.
episodes.title: Know Your Frenemies

episodes.synopsis: The school dance-a-thon might give the girls more than sore feet. Plus, Aria's old baby sitter, Simone, comes to visit and sets her sights on Ezra.
episodes.title: Careful What U Wish 4

episodes.synopsis: Emily deals with a jealous teammate. Aria and Ezra plan their first date out in the open. Spencer turns to Ali's brother, Jason, for information.
episodes.title: If at First You Don't Succeed, Lie, Lie Again

episodes.synopsis: At a crucial swim meet for the Rosewood Sharks, Emily and Paige are pitted against each other. Plus, Caleb calls in his favor with a guilty Hanna.
episodes.title: Je Suis Une Amie

episodes.synopsis: It's time for parent-teacher conferences, and one little liar's father sits face-to-face with the love of her life.
episodes.title: The New Normal

episodes.synopsis: As tensions rise, the girls ponder the true nature of evil. Plus, Aria views the school play as an opportunity to get closer to Ezra.
episodes.title: The Badass Seed

episodes.synopsis: After a shocking revelation from the police, it looks like the four little liars could be crying wolf.
episodes.title: A Person of Interest

episodes.synopsis: As the heat is turned up on suspicions surrounding Spencer, the girls must come to the realization that they aren't the only ones hiding secrets.
episodes.title: Someone to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: For Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer, keeping things hidden is second nature, but having to live with those secrets can become a big burden.
episodes.title: Monsters in the End

episodes.synopsis: The girls go to an unlikely source for help putting an end to "A" and the mystery surrounding their friend. Can they really stop "A" once and for all?
episodes.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls

episodes.synopsis: The drama continues moments after the explosive Season 1 finale, and the spotlight is turned on four guilty-looking liars.
episodes.title: It's Alive

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of many "good-byes," Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer must come to terms with being kept apart.
episodes.title: The Good-bye Look

episodes.synopsis: As the girls try to keep their distance from each other, they look to distractions to help fulfill the "separate time" request from their parents.
episodes.title: My Name Is Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The girls find that a helping hand is needed to get out of some tricky situations.
episodes.title: Blind Dates

episodes.synopsis: As the shocking news about Ian makes the rounds, Aria, Emily, Hanna, Spencer and their families all try to cope with the outcome.
episodes.title: The Devil You Know

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of the Rosewood Charity Fashion Show, Alison's mother returns to town and requests that the girls participate in the show.
episodes.title: Never Letting Go

episodes.synopsis: The girls are uneasy as each confronts complicated matters. Ezra and Jason vie for Aria's attention at the Montgomery's dinner party.
episodes.title: Surface Tension

episodes.synopsis: When Emily's dad surprises her before a big swim meet, the pressure sends her to the hospital.
episodes.title: Save the Date

episodes.synopsis: Spencer is determined to find out what Jason is hiding at his house. Hanna helps Caleb with a difficult decision about his family.
episodes.title: Picture This

episodes.synopsis: Aria tries to process Spencer and Emily's news about Jason while dealing with her feelings for him. Hanna tries to be nice to her future stepsister.
episodes.title: Touched by an A-ngel

episodes.synopsis: The girls finally reveal the torment "A" has put them through to the one person they trust outside their group: Dr. Anne Sullivan.
episodes.title: I Must Confess

episodes.synopsis: All is not what it seems as "A" sends the girls on a hunt to destroy lives.
episodes.title: Over My Dead Body

episodes.synopsis: In this special prequel episode, it's the Halloween before Alison went missing and the friends hope to score an invite to Noel's Halloween party.
episodes.title: The First Secret

episodes.synopsis: A month has passed since Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer were arrested and a lot has changed. What could have divided these four former friends?
episodes.title: Through Many Dangers, Toils and Snares

episodes.synopsis: The girls, realizing that "A" is not acting alone and his or her "helper" may be closer than they think, decide to enlist Caleb's hacking skills.
episodes.title: A Hot Piece of A

episodes.synopsis: Hanna starts to crumble under the weight of her secrets, while Spencer follows a blind lead about "A."
episodes.title: Let the Water Hold Me Down

episodes.synopsis: Love is a powerful motivator for Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer, especially if it means keeping their loved ones safe from "A."
episodes.title: The Blonde Leading the Blind

episodes.synopsis: After speaking to her friends about Caleb, Hanna feels they are giving her the cold shoulder. Emily hopes to reintroduce Maya to her mother.
episodes.title: A Kiss Before Lying

episodes.synopsis: As Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer participate in Rosewood High's "Truth-Up Day," the girls discover some shocking truths of their own.
episodes.title: The Naked Truth

episodes.synopsis: Hanna's worst nightmare comes to fruition when Caleb becomes a target of "A" and his computer is in possession of the cops.
episodes.title: Ctrl: A

episodes.synopsis: When a surprising new victim of "A" is revealed, the girls' tight-knit group may get one person larger.
episodes.title: Breaking the Code

episodes.synopsis: With strained relationships left and right, it's not an ideal time for the annual Father-Daughter Dance.
episodes.title: Father Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Jason drops off a bag of Alison's personal items that could be more than just a bag of junk. Toby's return to Rosewood brings a surprise reunion.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for answers about what Ali knew leads Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer to a run-down doll hospital that holds more than just secrets.
episodes.title: If These Dolls Could Talk

episodes.synopsis: Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer finally come face-to-face with their tormentor in the explosive season finale, as "A" is revealed.
episodes.title: unmAsked

episodes.synopsis: A summer has passed since "A" was put behind bars. Yet Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer are back on the defensive when a shocking event rocks Rosewood.
episodes.title: It Happened 'That Night'

episodes.synopsis: After getting a gruesome reminder that "A" is still calling the shots, Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer try to devise a plan to deal with this threat.
episodes.title: Blood Is the New Black

episodes.synopsis: When Spencer's mom takes on Garrett as a client, Spencer stumbles upon a Hastings family secret. Emily also gets some surprising news.
episodes.title: Kingdom of the Blind

episodes.synopsis: Visiting Mona is driving a wedge between Hanna and Caleb. Aria, meanwhile, dreads telling her mom that her dad is back on the dating scene.
episodes.title: Birds of a Feather

episodes.synopsis: Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer think something's up when Garrett gets a pass out of jail to visit his mom on the same night as Jenna's birthday party.
episodes.title: That Girl Is Poison

episodes.synopsis: After getting a major tip from Garrett, Hanna sets out to find out who is helping him, while Spencer tries to figure out the meaning of the clue.
episodes.title: The Remains of the A

episodes.synopsis: With new evidence in Alison's murder case, Hanna fears "A" may be framing her after a visit from Detective Wilden. Aria turns to Mona for answers.
episodes.title: Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Emily is struggling to deal not only with the loss of Maya, but the knowledge that someone drugged her "that night" and how it has now affected Paige.
episodes.title: Stolen Kisses

episodes.synopsis: Spencer and Aria find themselves at Noel and Eric Kahn's party in hopes of saving Spencer's college career. Hanna gets a text from "A" about Caleb.
episodes.title: The Kahn Game

episodes.synopsis: After learning that Noel's cabin had something to do with "that night," and possibly Maya's disappearance, the girls try to put the pieces together.
episodes.title: What Lies Beneath

episodes.synopsis: Emily is finally getting along with Paige. So when Spencer reveals a sordid tale about Paige's history with Alison, Emily isn't ready to listen.
episodes.title: Single Fright Female

episodes.synopsis: As Garrett's trial brings media attention to Rosewood, Emily remains at odds with her friends over Paige, and she doesn't know where to turn.
episodes.title: The Lady Killer

episodes.synopsis: The girls are looking forward to some Halloween fun. But once aboard the Rosewood Ghost Train, they get more than just some childish tricks or treats.
episodes.title: This Is a Dark Ride

episodes.synopsis: Radley Sanitarium has given Mona a clean bill of health and she is headed back to the halls of Rosewood High, much to the girls' dismay.
episodes.title: She's Better Now

episodes.synopsis: After the shocking events at the school marathon, Aria, Emily and Spencer are more certain than ever that Mona is up to her old tricks.
episodes.title: Mona-Mania

episodes.synopsis: Aria is sidelined by the flu, so Hanna and Emily follow up on a new clue on their own. Meredith takes care of Aria, but she may have ulterior motives.
episodes.title: Misery Loves Company

episodes.synopsis: Aria knows she should tell Ezra about his son, but she isn't ready for the consequences. Hanna is determined to learn what Caleb is keeping from her.
episodes.title: Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Inferno

episodes.synopsis: Ali's remains are with her family. But with all that has happened since Ali's disappearance, the girls are torn about going to yet another memorial.
episodes.title: Dead to Me

episodes.synopsis: Spencer continues on her downward spiral by taking her anger out on Mona. Hanna plans to bring Caleb together with his father -- but will it backfire?
episodes.title: What Becomes of the Broken-Hearted?

episodes.synopsis: After being shaken up by recent events and holding new information about Detective Wilden, Aria, Emily and Hanna hunt for details on the cop's past.
episodes.title: Hot Water

episodes.synopsis: Spencer is ready to talk, but Emily is not so ready to accept what she has to say. Hanna helps her mother after Ashley is involved in a hit-and-run.
episodes.title: Out of Sight, Out of Mind

episodes.synopsis: Spencer is missing, and the girls frantically search for answers, hoping their worst fears aren't true. But it's possible she disappeared willingly.
episodes.title: Will the Circle Be Unbroken?

episodes.synopsis: The stakes are high as each girl is forced into a difficult position. Will they be able to find a way out, or are they right where "A" wants them?
episodes.title: I'm Your Puppet

episodes.synopsis: In the explosive season finale, the girls don't have time to ponder Spencer's fragile health as shocking revelations are brought to the forefront.
episodes.title: A dAngerous gAme

episodes.synopsis: Featuring the voice of Mona, this special recaps the Liars' history with "A" from the very first text message to the most recent spotting of Red Coat.
episodes.title: A LiArs' Guide to Rosewood

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to uncover what new scheme "A" has in store in the wake of the lodge fire, the girls have no choice but to turn to Mona for answers.
episodes.title: A is for A-l-i-v-e

episodes.synopsis: Tired of feeling defenseless against "A," Aria learns self-defense and is intrigued by her sexy instructor. Meanwhile, Toby shares a tragic secret.
episodes.title: Turn of the Shoe

episodes.synopsis: Hanna worries that her mom is keeping a dangerous secret and is determined to protect her, leading to an awkward meeting with Detective Holbrook.
episodes.title: Cat's Cradle

episodes.synopsis: Holbrook's partner, Lt. Tanner, comes to town, intensifying their investigation into the Liars and their possible connection to Wilden's death.
episodes.title: Face Time

episodes.synopsis: Spencer and Emily make plans to visit a nearby college, but they have very different agendas for their time spent on campus.
episodes.title: Gamma Zeta Die!

episodes.synopsis: Hanna's attempt to protect her mom gets her in trouble with the police, and she has to explain why she's found with something she shouldn't have.
episodes.title: Under the Gun

episodes.synopsis: Teaming up to investigate "A" and the events on the night of the lodge fire, Caleb and Toby uncover a new possible identity for "Red Coat."
episodes.title: Crash & Burn, Girl

episodes.synopsis: Hanna comes up with a desperate plan to save her mother from a conviction and turns to the only person she thinks can help: Mona.
episodes.title: The Guilty Girl's Handbook

episodes.synopsis: Paige throws Emily a surprise party with even more surprising guests. But it's the actions of "A" that lead to the biggest shock of all.
episodes.title: Into the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Emily is taken aback when Mrs. DiLaurentis offers to let her move into Ali's room -- and is even more distraught when the others urge Emily to accept.
episodes.title: The Mirror Has Three Faces

episodes.synopsis: As the Liars step up their investigation into their most recent suspect, a Western-themed dance turns into a two-step with "A."
episodes.title: Bring Down the Hoe

episodes.synopsis: The Liars take a road trip to Ravenswood, where they make a shocking discovery that proves everything they thought they knew about "A" might be wrong.
episodes.title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't

episodes.synopsis: After finding a clue that suggests that Ali may be alive, Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer crash a creepy cemetery party to find Ali before "A" can.
episodes.title: Grave New World

episodes.synopsis: Knowing that Alison is alive, Hanna comes up with the idea that if the girls find out who is really buried in Ali's grave it may lead to answers.
episodes.title: Who's In the Box?

episodes.synopsis: Now that Hanna has shared with Aria, Emily and Spencer that she has Ali's diary, the girls hope it can shed light on their many questions.
episodes.title: Love ShAck, Baby

episodes.synopsis: Shana returns with a message from Ali, but Emily and the girls don't trust Shana. Meanwhile, Aria and Hanna contend with matters of the heart.
episodes.title: Close Encounters

episodes.synopsis: Hanna's new interest in crime novels helps her to come up with a plan to try to figure out whose body is in Ali's grave.
episodes.title: Bite Your Tongue

episodes.synopsis: With Spencer's possible revelation about Board Shorts, she's even more determined to prove her theory before presenting it to the other girls.
episodes.title: Hot for Teacher

episodes.synopsis: In this film noir-inspired episode, Spencer's pill-induced insomnia starts to take a toll, as her hunt for Ali and much-needed answers continues.
episodes.title: Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Spencer is determined to tell Aria what she has found out about Ezra, but Emily and Hanna are worried about what it could do to their friend.
episodes.title: Free Fall

episodes.synopsis: Emily, Hanna and Spencer are concerned for Aria after she learns the news about Ezra. Not knowing who to trust, Aria goes looking for answers.
episodes.title: She's Come Undone

episodes.synopsis: Emily searches for answers about Ezra and Mona, and tries to make sense of the situation. Hanna investigates a possible new lead in Alison's case.
episodes.title: Cover for Me

episodes.synopsis: While taking part in a bridal fashion show, the girls consider whether Mrs. DiLaurentis might have anything to do with the latest note from A.
episodes.title: Unbridled

episodes.synopsis: Alison's friends finally learn the truth about what happened that night years ago. Now, with this information, they might find who's truly behind A.
episodes.title: A Is for Answers

episodes.synopsis: With the girls still in shock over Ezra's shooting, Aria stands guard at the hospital while the rest of the Liars hatch a plot to expose "A."
episodes.title: EscApe from New York

episodes.synopsis: Back in Rosewood with the events of New York City behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets.
episodes.title: Whirly Girlie

episodes.synopsis: Alison struggles with the death of her mother. Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer try to cover their tracks and piece together what happened in New York.
episodes.title: Surfing the Aftershocks

episodes.synopsis: The girls continue to feel pressure at school and from Ali, as she attempts to regain her group leader role, and Mona makes plans for Ali’s return.
episodes.title: Thrown from the Ride

episodes.synopsis: Ready or not, it’s Alison’s first day back at Rosewood High, and Mona and her army are ready. Meanwhile, Caleb and an old foe return to Rosewood.
episodes.title: Miss Me X 100

episodes.synopsis: Both Alison and Caleb question their decision to return after the latest Rosewood "accident" spooks Alison.
episodes.title: Run Ali Run

episodes.synopsis: Aria looks for answers at Radley. Spencer borrows some of Ezra's spy equipment to keep a closer eye on the home front. Ali and Caleb butt heads.
episodes.title: The Silence of E. Lamb

episodes.synopsis: Alison moves in with Hanna, pushing Hanna further down a dark path. Spencer and Emily try to solve the mystery of the dead girl in Alison's grave.
episodes.title: Scream for Me

episodes.synopsis: Hanna's friends can no longer stand by and watch her self-destruct; Emily seeks information linking Alison to Noel; Spencer consults an eye doctor.
episodes.title: March of Crimes

episodes.synopsis: Ali is called in to identify her kidnapper, knowing that the police have the wrong man, and Emily tries to convince her to do the right thing.
episodes.title: A Dark Ali

episodes.synopsis: Melissa's secrets are finally revealed, and Hanna demands Caleb tell her the truth about Ravenswood. Emily is on the hunt for answers of her own.
episodes.title: No One Here Can Love or Understand Me

episodes.synopsis: When "A" forbids them from going to the police, the PLLs reluctantly put their faith in Mona. Meanwhile, Alison assembles a team of her own.
episodes.title: Taking This One to the Grave

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, the girls plot to clear Spencer's name, get justice for Mona and bring Alison down for good.
episodes.title: How the 'A' Stole Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is more convinced than ever that Alison is responsible for Mona's death. But with an airtight alibi, the girls try a different route.
episodes.title: Through a Glass, Darkly

episodes.synopsis: Toby is put in a difficult position with his job and with Spencer. Meanwhile, Emily and Aria take drastic measures to maintain control.
episodes.title: Fresh Meat

episodes.synopsis: Spencer searches for Mona's missing laptop, Aria tries to come clean to Ezra about her lie but gets diverted while Hanna covers up Ashely's secret.
episodes.title: Over a Barrel

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting that "A" is out to frame her for Mona's murder, Hanna takes action. Caleb and Hanna's friends try to get her off the hook.
episodes.title: The Bin of Sin

episodes.synopsis: Spencer lets down her guard with Jonny, Emily continues to figure out Talia and Hanna investigates Mona's friend Leslie.
episodes.title: Oh, What Hard Luck Stories They All Hand Me

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's stressed about getting accepted to college. Meanwhile, the girls keep tabs on Mike following an incident at the school blood drive.
episodes.title: Out, Damned Spot

episodes.synopsis: Determined to get college tuition money, Hanna's on a quest to win the local beauty pageant. Meanwhile, Aria asks Andrew to help keep tabs on Mike.
episodes.title: Pretty Isn't the Point

episodes.synopsis: Armed with their new information about Mona, the Liars decide to speak to Alison. But the new revelation could have repercussions for Aria's family.
episodes.title: Bloody Hell

episodes.synopsis: Aria, Emily and Hanna look for a way to prove Ali's innocence without incriminating Mike. But a proposed plea bargain could implicate one of them.
episodes.title: To Plea or Not to Plea

episodes.synopsis: Alison's trial begins, and the once-confident Queen Bee is no longer certain of her fate as her lies and the lies of those close to her are revealed.
episodes.title: The Melody Lingers On

episodes.synopsis: Alison's fate looks even bleaker when the prosecution calls a surprise witness, so Aria, Emily and Spencer race to find a way to save their friend.
episodes.title: I'm a Good Girl, I Am

episodes.synopsis: Can the Liars survive the new game "A" has in store for them? As shocking secrets come to light, a clue to the "A" mystery is uncovered.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Dollhouse
